title: How to Catch Eevee in Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire

steps.title: Get the National Dex.
steps.content: Get the National Dex. You can get it after you have successfully defeated or captured Groudon or Kyogre, and you need to go to Littleroot Town and talk to Professor Birch. He will upgrade your Pokédex.

steps.title: Go to Route 116 near Rustboro City.
steps.content: Go to Route 116 near Rustboro City. Here you will find Eevee and other Pokémon such as Nincada and the common Zigzagoon. But the only way to find it is to use the Dexnav. The Dexnav will sense a silhouette and a cry that will sound like Eevee. So approach it by creeping over to it, and then you can encounter it.

steps.title: After you have successfully encountered Eevee, capture it!
steps.content: After you have successfully encountered Eevee, capture it! Once you catch it, you can turn it into any Eeveelution!

steps.title: Use it.
steps.content: Use it. Now that you've caught Eevee, you can just search for it anytime and it will just appear. By just pressing the Eevee sprite on the Dexnav and clicking Search, you will have lots of Eevee in no time.
